annotation.spannedText: Nine people who visited Disneyland or Disneyland California Adventure Park during December have confirmed measles cases

classMention.mentionClass: Nine people who visited Disneyland or Disneyland California Adventure Park during December have confirmed measles cases

annotation.spannedText: All of the patients visited the parks in Orange County between Dec. 15 and Dec. 20

classMention.mentionClass: All of the patients visited the parks in Orange County between Dec. 15 and Dec. 20

annotation.spannedText: California Department of Public Health officials

classMention.mentionClass: California Department of Public Health officials

annotation.spannedText: "If you have symptoms, and believe you may have been exposed, please contact your health care provider," ... "The best way to prevent measles and its spread is to get vaccinated."

classMention.mentionClass: "If you have symptoms, and believe you may have been exposed, please contact your health care provider," ... "The best way to prevent measles and its spread is to get vaccinated."

annotation.spannedText: Dr. Ron Chapman, CDPH director and state health officer,

classMention.mentionClass: Dr. Ron Chapman, CDPH director and state health officer,

annotation.spannedText: Kathleen Harriman, chief of vaccine preventable diseases for the state,

classMention.mentionClass: Kathleen Harriman, chief of vaccine preventable diseases for the state,

annotation.spannedText: that "it's our speculation that there was an [infected] international visitor at one of the parks, and that person or persons was able to infect a lot of people."

classMention.mentionClass: that "it's our speculation that there was an [infected] international visitor at one of the parks, and that person or persons was able to infect a lot of people."

annotation.spannedText: "So all the cases of measles in the United States originate with an imported case," ... "even though there can be transmission once one of those cases gets here."

classMention.mentionClass: "So all the cases of measles in the United States originate with an imported case," ... "even though there can be transmission once one of those cases gets here."

annotation.spannedText: that while the measles vaccine is highly effective, conferring lifelong immunity in 99 percent of people who receive two doses, there will always be a small number of people who can get infected despite being vaccinated

classMention.mentionClass: that while the measles vaccine is highly effective, conferring lifelong immunity in 99 percent of people who receive two doses, there will always be a small number of people who can get infected despite being vaccinated

annotation.spannedText: Deputy Chief Health Officer Dr. Erica Pan

classMention.mentionClass: Deputy Chief Health Officer Dr. Erica Pan

annotation.spannedText: officials there are "working with the health facility where the patient was seen" to identify other patients and health care workers who may have been exposed

classMention.mentionClass: officials there are "working with the health facility where the patient was seen" to identify other patients and health care workers who may have been exposed

annotation.spannedText: health officers will quarantine susceptible contacts, especially those at high risk of developing disease, "to make sure that contact stays home and away from other people to make sure that person does not infect others."

classMention.mentionClass: health officers will quarantine susceptible contacts, especially those at high risk of developing disease, "to make sure that contact stays home and away from other people to make sure that person does not infect others."

annotation.spannedText: if people are concerned, they "should check on their immunization status and get vaccinated" if needed

classMention.mentionClass: if people are concerned, they "should check on their immunization status and get vaccinated" if needed

annotation.spannedText: that they had received no reports of staff contracting measles

classMention.mentionClass: that they had received no reports of staff contracting measles

annotation.spannedText: Park officials are working with the health department to provide any necessary information
